description: a(1) = 8; a(n+1) = least k with d(k) = a(n).
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {a=8; print1(a, ", "); for (n=2, nn, k=1; while(numdiv(k) != a, k++); print1(k, ", "); a = k;);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 17 2015
author: _Donald S. McDonald_
extensions: One more term from _Naohiro Nomoto_, Jun 28 2001
